This was fun! Let's skip the stripping next time, though, guys... It's obvious what the most exciting part of this game was...
The only thing I'm sad about is that I couldn't get all of you to fap today...
You think you won? Sure, keep telling yourself that...
Remember to subscribe to ZTV News and leave a like and a comment!
So... Which one of you wants to clean up my upper thighs the most...? As long as you only use your tongue, go right ahead...!

scene.name: Restaurant
scene.directive: Gotta say, this wasn't what I was expecting when you said you wanted to take me somewhere.
Not that I was expecting fast food or burgers out of a truck or something.
But you really went all-out with this. Somebody told you about my expensive tastes.
You must really be trying to get in my panties with this, huh?
I'm joking, god. There's really no need to be so tense. I don't bite.
(Not without a safe word, anyway.)
Shall we take a little peek at the menu?
Oh, it all looks so good!
Decisions, decisions...
Coq Au Vin could be fun. You'd better believe I love a mouthful of thick, creamy Coq!
But I'm partial to salmon, too.
Yes, I think I'll have the calamari starter.
(I'm a big fan of squid.)
And for the main, I'm thinking...
Let's keep it simple. Kobe ribeye, blue.
And a bottle of Ren√© Pogel for us both, please.
(Th-thank you!)

scene.name: Time to Unwind
scene.directive: Okay, am I going crazy, or did that waitress look familiar?
(Also, what was that piece of paper you gave her?)
Was she on my website? Is she from the Inventory?
Maybe Dave was right. I do need some time off.
Have some time to myself, away from the studio...
...Unwind, de-stress, maybe catch up with my--

scene.name: Music
scene.directive: Oh shit, I love this song!
‚ô™ ...Scent and the aroma refuses to breathe... More like a haze that's trying to succeed... ‚ô´
How did you know!?
‚ô™ ...Drawing me in, mag- I mean, pulling me to you... ‚ô´
God, I've not even started drinking yet and I'm already a mess.

scene.name: Player's Plans
scene.directive: Speaking of which...
You'd better not have taken me out here just so you can get me drunk.
...And then take advantage of my impaired state.

scene.name: Zone-tan's Plans?
scene.directive: You know, just repeatedly having your way with me while I'm powerless to resist.
And if I'm not pliable enough, you just have to fuck me harder, until I'm willing to cooperate.
Using me like a cheap fucktoy after you tear my nice new dress to shreds.
Making all the effort I put into my makeup go to waste as it smears down my face in a mix of spit and sweat and tears.
You'd never do something like that to me, right?
Not even if I spent all night teasing you? Getting you nice and pent up and desperate?
Of course not.

scene.name: Footsies
scene.directive: Oh, I'm sorry, did my foot just brush against something under the table?
Silly me. Let me just move it.
There. Better?
It's not? Me moving my foot back and forth like that isn't making it any less uncomfortable?
And you don't wanna cream your pants in the middle of a fancy restaurant?
That's a shame.
If it helps, I'm not going to do anything in my panties.
Can you guess why I can't? Do you want to see why?
Are you going to ask nicely?
Well...

scene.name: Wine
scene.directive: Oh, look, the wine's here!
Thank you, that's lovely!
(Have we met somewhere before?)

scene.name: Bathroom Break
scene.directive: So, like I was saying...
...Think you can wait until we get home?
Or are we going to have to take a trip to the bathrooms before the starters arrive?
I don't care either way. I just wanna--

scene.name: Approached by a Fan
scene.directive: Hello? Do I know you?
Oh, you're a fan? Of my show?
Aww, that's so sweet! Stop it, you're too kind!
~name~, would you mind taking a picture of us?
Thanks, ~name~. You're the best!

scene.name: Selfie!
scene.directive: *CLICK*
Y'know, I'm pretty sure she was trying to touch my boob there.
You jealous?
Yeah, I bet you are.
Don't lie! You were staring at them the whole night!

scene.name: Player is a Liar
scene.directive: You really weren't?
Seriously?
And here I was, ready to offer you the chance to right that horrible wrong.
Of course, if you don't want to touch my boobs, that's fine too...

scene.name: Admit your Wrongs
scene.directive: Nope, too late! No backpedalling out of this one!
If you want it that badly, you have to admit you were perving on me during our dinner.
C'mon, don't be shy. If you don't say it, neither of us will be getting what we want.
Don't be a wimp!

scene.name: Shaky Hands
scene.directive: Ha! I knew it! Your hands are shaking! You're totally nervous!
You call that groping? I've seen less awkward attempts to fondle a pair of breasts at a high school prom!

scene.name: Groping
scene.directive: I-Is -nff!- that really the best you can do?
What kind of amateur hour shit is this, ~name~?
It's like you're not even trying.

scene.name: Full-on Groping
scene.directive: Y-Yep. I've met tentacle monsters better at this than you, and they don't even have finger bones.
(Or hands...)
S-Seriously, I mean, this is just sad.
Who taught you how to fuck a girl? Stamper? Dave?
(No, Zone-tan. The bedroom is not a place for saying that name.)
Honestly, th-this is just--

scene.name: Grope Stop
scene.directive: ...huh?
